title: DeGrasse Tyson Robbed ‘a Dope Dealer in Harlem’
subtitle: Astrophysicist Neil DeGrasse Tyson did not convey a bizarre tale of robbing a drug dealer of LSD when explaining the impetus for his career.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Neil DeGrasse Tyson said his interest in "astrological [physics]" stemmed from his experience stealing and consuming large quantities of LSD as a young teen in Harlem.
